scripts.fmt:check: npx prettier --check . && uv run ruff format --diff
scripts.fmt: npm run fmt:prettier && npm run fmt:ruff && npm run fmt:misc
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:ruff && npm run lint:fix:misc
scripts.lint: npm run lint:mypy && npm run lint:ruff && npm run lint:misc
scripts.test: uv run pytest --copy-coverage -k injected --no-cov && uv run pytest --cov-append -k 'not injected'
